pkgmetadata.longdescription: Benchmark for the CEC 2005 Special Session on Real-Parameter Optimization // This package is a wrapper for the C implementation of the 25 benchmark functions for the CEC 2005 Special Session on Real-Parameter Optimization. The original C code by Santosh Tiwari and related documentation are available at http://www.ntu.edu.sg/home/EPNSugan/index_files/CEC-05/CEC05 .htm.
